name: Guardian Crystal of the Deep
description: When there is 1 enemy, all DEF is increased by 50%.

When there is 1 enemy, all DEF is increased by 72%.
When there is 1 enemy, all DEF is increased by 86%.

story: A blue gem that was once set on the crown of Protianus. A clear gem that represents protection.
